thread.title: BRIEF-China Shipbuilding Industry Group Sea Defense and Information Confrontation plans name change to China Marine Information Electronics Company Limited

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Shipbuilding Industry Group Sea Defense and Information Confrontation plans name change to China Marine Information Electronics Company Limited

organizations.name: reuters) - china shipbuilding industry group sea defense and information confrontation co lt
china marine information electronics company limited
brief-china shipbuilding industry group sea defense and information confrontation

text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - China Shipbuilding Industry Group Sea Defense and Information Confrontation Co Ltd :
* Says the Board approves to change its name to China Marine Information Electronics Company Limited
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/XowZ8P
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
